title: Tribe inks Broussard to one-year deal
subtitle: Tribe inks Broussard to one-year deal
body: CLEVELAND -- The Indians have been talking for weeks about the platoon situation they'll have at first with Ben Broussard and Eduardo Perez this coming season. One little thing that had to get done, though: They had to get Broussard under contract first. That finally happened Wednesday night, as the Tribe avoided arbitration with Broussard by signing him to a one-year contract worth $2.48 million. Anthony Castrovince is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Anthony Castrovince
